locations.name: The Bedroom
locations.description:
As you stand in your bedroom, your heart pounding in your chest, 
you quickly take stock of your surroundings. You need to act fast. 
The first priority is to find a way out of your house and assess the situation outside.
you have two options: The living room (south) or the bathroom (east)

items.name: first aid kit
items.description: A well-stocked first aid kit containing bandages, antiseptic, and painkillers

items.name: baseball bat
items.description: A wooden baseball bat, worn and splintered but still sturdy

locations.name: The Bathroom
locations.description:
You step into the bathroom, feeling the cramped space surround you. 
The flickering light barely illuminates the worn tiles on the floor. 
The air carries a musty odor, a reminder of the neglect this room has endured. 
You have two options: (south) you see a door leading to the hallway, 
or (east) a small window offers an escape onto the roof

items.name: razor
items.description: A worn razor with a sharp blade rests on the counter, ready for a close shave

items.name: floss
items.description: A roll of dental floss sits nearby, a tool to keep your teeth clean and healthy in the midst of chaos

locations.name: The Roof
locations.description:
As you cautiously climb onto the roof through a small opening in the bathroom ceiling, 
you find yourself standing on a weathered surface, cracked and worn by the elements. 
The once bright red tiles have faded over time, giving the rooftop an eerie ambiance. 
The only exit from the roof is to the (west), leading back into the bathroom, its too far to jump down

prompts.response:
You scan the area from the rooftop, taking in the bleak landscape that stretches before you. In the distance, 
you spot the skeletal remains of a once-bustling town. Among the crumbling buildings, your eyes fixate on the glimmering facade of a shopping mall. 
It stands as a beacon of potential resources and shelter amidst the chaos. Your gaze then shifts to the outskirts of town, 
where a tunnel entrance emerges, seemingly untouched by the undead. It offers a possible escape route to safety. 
Armed with this knowledge, you steel yourself for the challenges ahead, ready to navigate the dangers and make your way towards the mall and the tunnel.

items.name: rusty crowbar
items.description:
a rusty crowbar lying near the edge of the roof. Its worn handle suggests it has seen its fair share of use, 
possibly for breaking into or out of places.

items.name: Telescope
items.description:
The second object is an old, weathered telescope, fixed on top of a tripod. 
It seems to have been used for stargazing in the days before chaos descended upon the world.

locations.name: The Living room
locations.description:
You take a deep breath, steeling your nerves, and decide to quietly approach the room 
from where the growling sound originated. Slowly and cautiously, you make your way into the living room, 
trying to minimize any noise that might alert the creature near by.

As you reach the room, you peak your head around the corner 
looking for any movement or signs of danger. 
The growling becomes more distinct, accompanied by occasional shuffling sounds. 
It's clear that there is a zombie lurking in here

 with a steady hand, you reach for your backpack, it's important to be prepared for what might happen

prompts.prompt: search your bag for a weapon
prompts.response: You search your backpack for something that can be used as a weapon and find a

items.name: metal pipe
items.description: A sturdy metal pipe, slightly rusted but still useful as a makeshift weapon.

items.name: family photo
items.description: A faded photograph depicting happier times, serving as a bittersweet reminder of what once was.

locations.name: The Hallway
locations.description:
You decide to head towards the hallway to investigate further. 
With cautious steps, you leave your bedroom and enter the dimly lit hallway. 
The air feels heavy, and the silence is eerie. As you glance around, 
you notice several closed doors, each leading to different parts of your house.
Suddenly, you hear a low, guttural growl coming from one of the nearby rooms. 
The sound sends shivers down your spine, confirming your worst fears: 
The zombies have infiltrated your house. It's crucial to remain calm and think on your feet.

prompts.response: As you survey the dimly lit hallway, shadows dance along the peeling wallpaper, creating an eerie atmosphere. Flickering lights cast intermittent illumination, revealing worn carpeting underfoot. The sounds of shuffling feet grow louder, signifying the presence of approaching zombies. Amidst the gloom, you notice a glint on the floor and spot a set of keys. They may prove useful in unlocking doors or vehicles, potentially providing an escape route or access to valuable resources. Exercise caution as you navigate this treacherous corridor, knowing that danger lurks around every corner.

items.name: keys
items.description: A set of keys, jingling softly as you pick them up. They may unlock doors or vehicles, opening up new possibilities for exploration or escape.

locations.name: The Garage
locations.description: A dimly lit, musty space filled with abandoned tools and discarded vehicle parts. The remnants of failed attempts to escape lie scattered amidst oil stains and broken windows.

locations.name: The Street
locations.description: A desolate, eerie stretch of cracked asphalt. Abandoned cars line the sides, their windows shattered and doors left open. Silence reigns, broken only by the faint rustle of wind through discarded debris

locations.name: The Highway
locations.description: A desolate stretch of asphalt, overgrown with weeds and abandoned vehicles. The distant moans of the undead mix with the sound of wind whistling through empty shells of cars

locations.name: The Mall
locations.description: A once bustling hub of commerce now reduced to a labyrinth of debris and broken storefronts. Shattered mannequins and overturned kiosks are haunting reminders of past human presence.

locations.name: The Tunnel
locations.description: A narrow, claustrophobic passage leading deep underground. The walls are damp, with patches of moss and eerie, echoing footsteps reverberating through the darkness.
